summary: Many years of experience in different fields, mainly in customer service and sales. Strong ability in making people feeling happy, listened to, and able to solve their problems. Quick learner who seeks challenges, new experiences, and new knowledge. A positive, open minded and enthusiastic team player with strong analytical and organizational skills. Details oriented person and able to work under pressure in a busy international environment. Great experience in managing team including their professional growth, motivation and training.
